operations.summary: search Pop Up Archive text fields
operations.notes:
Facets: Narrow the dataset that is queried.
Usage in the sandbox: enter the facet in the query field. For example, news&duration:[500 TO 1000] (query all assets between 500 and 1000 seconds long for the string "news"
Available Facets
FacetDescriptionExample
id:Query a faceted subset based on UID associated with an individual objectid:5789
collection_id:Query a faceted subset based on UID associated with a collectioncollection_id:504
title:Robert*Query a faceted subset based on the title fieldtitle:"Snap Judgement"
collection_title:Query a faceted subset based on the collection title fieldcollection_title:WBUR*
episode_title:Query a faceted subset based on the episode title fieldepisode_title:star*
series_titleQuery a faceted subset based on the series title fieldseries_title:"Hidden Kitchens"
rightsQuery a faceted subset based on the rights fieldrights:green
tagsQuery a faceted subset based on the tags fieldtags:Community
notesQuery a faceted subset based on the notes fieldnotes:interview
description:Query a faceted subset based on the description fielddescription:paris
duration:Query a faceted subset based on the duration (in seconds) of the objectsduration:[300 TO 500]
date_addedQuery a faceted subset based on the date the object was addeddate_added:[2013-07-09 TO *]
date_createdQuery a faceted subset based on the date the object was createddate_created:[2013-12-09 TO 2014-01-31]
date_broadcastQuery a faceted subset based on the date the object was broadcastdate_broadcast:[2013-12-09 TO *]
hostQuery a faceted subset based on the host fieldhost:"Christopher Lydon"
producerQuery a faceted subset based on the producer fieldproducer:"The Kitchen Sisters"
interviewerQuery a faceted subset based on the interviewer fieldinterviewer:"Studs Terkel"
intervieweeQuery a faceted subset based on the interviewee fieldinterviewee:"Simon Winchester"
creatorQuery a faceted subset based on the creator fieldcreator:"WILL Radio"
